properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 15 at 11:57AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
Moist onshore flow will continue to produce fog along the
nearshore waters and coastal areas this afternoon. Visibilities
will generally range from 3 to 5 nautical miles, with patchy
dense fog of 1 nautical mile or less at times. Widespread dense
fog is likely to redevelop this evening and overnight.

Mariners over the Bay Waters and over the Nearshore Coastal
Waters within 20 nautical miles offshore are urged to prepare for
rapidly changing visibilities.

NWSheadline: PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE NEARSHORE WATERS
